I contributed as an expert to the preparatory work for the Swedish Ministry of Education's inquiry **"Ämneskunskaper och lärarskicklighet – en reformerad lärarutbildning, SOU 2024:81".** The inquiry examined how incorporating insights from cognitive science and the science of learning could strengthen the education of Swedish teachers.

Link: <https://www.regeringen.se/rattsliga-dokument/statens-offentliga-utredningar/2024/12/sou-202481/>
